DOC.brief_summary: Study assess effect Itraconazole Fluconazole pharmacokinetics Selumetinib ( AZD6244 ; ARRY-142866 ) ( Hyd-Sulfate ) Healthy Male Volunteers
DOC.brief_title: To Assess Effect Itraconazole Fluconazole Pharmacokinetics Selumetinib Healthy Male Volunteers
DOC.detailed_description: A Open-label , Single-center Study Assess Effect CYP3A4 Inhibitor Itraconazole CYP2C19 Inhibitor Fluconazole Pharmacokinetics 25 mg Single Oral Dose Selumetinib ( AZD6244 ; ARRY-142866 ) ( Hyd-Sulfate ) Healthy Volunteers
DOC.criteria: 1 . Have body mass index ( BMI ) 18 30 kg/m2 ( inclusive ) weigh least 50 kg 100 kg . 2 . Female subject nonchildbearing potential . 3 . Have calculate creatinine clearance ( CrCL ) > 50 mL/min use CockcroftGault formula . 1 . Subjects Japanese nonJapanese Asian ethnicity . 2 . Any one parent grandparent ( maternal paternal ) Japanese nonJapanese . Asian ( ie , China , Taiwan , Korea , Philippines , Thailand , Vietnam Malaysia ) . Asian Indians acceptable . 3 . Current past history central serous retinopathy retinal vein thrombosis , intraocular pressure > 21 mmHg uncontrolled glaucoma . 4 . Any clinically relevant abnormal finding physical examination , hematology , clinical chemistry , urinalysis , vital sign ECG baseline opinion investigator .
